entities.name: aberforth dumbledore
entities.description: Aberforth Dumbledore is mentioned as a character who might have blamed Albus for his sister's death. He is described as having a brief boyhood friendship with Grindelwald.

entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as the person who was possibly blamed by Aberforth for his sister's death. It is also stated that he never saw Grindelwald again after the girl's death.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is mentioned as a person who was expelled from Durmstrang for near-fatal attacks upon fellow students. He fled the country hours after the girl's death and had a brief boyhood friendship with Aberforth.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is mentioned as the sister of Albus who died. The text does not provide any information about her death.

relationships.description: Aberforth Dumbledore and Grindelwald had a brief boyhood friendship.
Albus never saw Grindelwald again after the girl's death.
